trans-unit.source: Represents the AudienceRestriction element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.5.1.4].
If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is empty, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown during serialization.
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스가 나타내는 요소에 대 한 자세한 내용은 SAML V2.0 핵심 사양을 참조 하세요.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class with no Audience elements.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"> </xref> Audience 요소 없는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> property is initialized to an empty collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class with the specified URIs.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"> </xref> 지정 된 Uri가 있는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is initialized using the elements of the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>컬렉션은 지정된 된 컬렉션의 요소를 사용 하 여 초기화 합니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref:System.Uri> that contains the Audience elements contained in this restriction.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is initialized with the specified Audience element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>컬렉션 지정된 된 대상 그룹 요소를 사용 하 여 초기화 됩니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the contents of the Audience element contained in this restriction.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>이 제한에 포함 된 Audience 요소 내용을 나타내는.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of URIs that specifies the audiences to which the assertion is addressed.
trans-unit.target: 주소를 지정 어설션이 대상 그룹을 지정 하는 Uri의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The condition is valid if the relying party is a member of any of the specified audiences.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 신뢰 당사자가 지정 된 대상 그룹의 멤버인 경우에 유효 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Audience elements contained by the AudienceRestriction element.
trans-unit.target: AudienceRestriction 요소에 포함 된 Audience 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of type <xref:System.Uri> that specifies the audiences.
